description: This file defines a Room Data Access Object (DAO) for the Category entity, providing methods for CRUD operations and queries related to Category objects in the database.

classes.name: CategoryDao
classes.description: Repository interface for accessing Category data, providing methods to observe, insert (upsert), and delete categories.

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all Category entities ordered by name, allowing observations of database changes.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts a Category into the database, replacing existing entries on conflict; returns the row ID of the inserted item.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the provided Category from the database.
